alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 25 at 1:22PM PST until January 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, San Bernardino County Mountains and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
